DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study was to compare the early clinical outcomes of minimally invasive bilateral subvastus and midvastus approaches for total knee arthroplasty.
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison of Subvastus and Midvastus Approaches in Minimally-Invasive Total Knee Arthroplasty
DOC.criteria: patients with advanced bilateral osteoarthritis of the knee for treatment with total knee arthroplasty patients who wish to undergo bilateral total knee arthroplasty as part of a single surgical procedure patients who were previously treated with knee arthroplasty
